name: Being Plundered
description:
In Being Plundered, you are a hard-working asteroid miner who dreams of rich life. Yet every time you get closer to your dreams, those damn space pirates show up and force you to spend your money on repairs.

Reach your dream goal of $100000 by mining asteroids and selling the ore, but watch out for the pirates! The more ore and money you have, the more pirates there will be!

Made for the 48h compo Ludum Dare #40
